alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Corson County through 445 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Isabel, or 19 miles west of Timber Lake, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Corson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
